title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Posts Record $532 Million Daily Loss as BTC Price Slump Worsens
contentSnippet: BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) shed a daily record $523 million in investments on Tuesday, extending a five-day streak of outflows.

title: AI Agents Need Identity and Zero-Knowledge Proofs Are the Solution
contentSnippet: ZKPs could become the backbone of a new era of trusted AI and digital identity, giving individuals and organizations a way to interact safely and transparently across platforms and borders, argues Evi

title: 10-year Bitcoin model approves buying BTC at $100K since time does ‘the heavy lifting’
contentSnippet: A new Bitcoin model shows long-term returns remain in the 300% range regardless of an investors’ entry price. Will shifting global liquidity change the outcome this time?

title: Bitcoin Slips Back Below $90K — Crypto Correction Now Ranks Among Worst Since 2017, K33 Says
contentSnippet: After a rare spot of outperformance on Tuesday, bitcoin has resumed sliding, with one analyst eyeing $84,000–$86,000 as potential local bottom.

title: The Biggest Challenges Facing Bitcoin Miners Going Into 2026
contentSnippet: Analysts warn that pressures around power, software, and hosting could change the economics of Bitcoin mining.

title: Stella's XLM Token Breaks Key $0.25 Support as Altcoins Suffer Continued Drawdown
contentSnippet: Technical breakdown gains momentum as institutional selling accelerates through overnight session.

title: Bullish posts record Q3 earnings, but shares keep sliding
contentSnippet: Bullish posted record revenue and profit in the third quarter, but the strong results failed to sway investors, with the company’s share price continuing to decline.

title: Coinbase Debuts DEX Trading in Brazil as ‘Everything App’ Vision Grows
contentSnippet: The move comes amid new regulations from Brazil's central bank, requiring crypto firms to be licensed and report international transactions.

title: Crypto Majors Chop ahead of NVDA earnings! Kraken raises $800M! Fidelity launch SOL ETF!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors were slightly green ahead of tonight’s major NVDA earnings call, with BTC hovering around $91,300, ETH up 2% at $3,090, BNB up 1% at $922, and SOL also up 1% at $139. Among top movers, M

title: Bullish Shares Drop After Crypto Exchange Reports Record Q3 Revenue
contentSnippet: Shares in crypto exchange Bullish dropped more than 5% after the firm announced its Q3 earnings on Wednesday.

title: HBAR Slides 0.5% to $0.146 as Technical Support Crumbles
contentSnippet: Hedera's native token breaks key levels on elevated volume. Institutional distribution patterns intensify selling pressure.

title: ICP Softens as Failed Breakout Above $5.17 Shifts Market Back Into Consolidation
contentSnippet: A surge in trading activity at key resistance levels marked the exhaustion of Monday’s rally, sending ICP back toward its short-term support band.

title: BONK Extends Slide as Key Support Break Raises Prospect of Further Downside
contentSnippet: BONK slipped beneath a key support level amid a sharp rise in trading activity, with intraday charts now pointing toward a fragile short-term structure.

title: Crypto Long & Short: Licences, Liquidity and the Shifting Geography of Exchange Quality
contentSnippet: In this week’s Crypto Long & Short Newsletter, Joshua de Vos shares insights from a recent Benchmark report on how the exchange landscape is maturing and becoming more execution-focused, but increasin

title: 1inch Gives Developers Early Access to New Shared Liquidity Protocol Aqua
contentSnippet: Aqua will allow multiple DeFi strategies to operate using the same capital simultaneously, without compromising self-custody for users.

title: $90K Bitcoin price is a ‘close your eyes and bid’ opportunity: Analyst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s current correction is the largest of the bull market, but data indicate that the price is approaching prime capitulation territory.

title: Senate Banking Panel Advances FDIC's Travis Hill for Wider Confirmation Vote
contentSnippet: The Senate Banking Committee voted along party lines to send FDIC Acting Chair Travis Hill's nomination to the wider Senate for a final vote on taking the permanent job.

title: The Protocol: Hyperliquid Introduces Proposal to Cut Fees
contentSnippet: Also: Aerodrome Overhaul, Cloudflare Outage and dYdX Buyback Increase Approved.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Set for Rebound? Here's What Analysts Think
contentSnippet: Analysts see a potential short-term rebound, as retail panic selling of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP signals a historical buying opportunity.

title: US government reopening may unleash crypto ETF floodgates: Analyst
contentSnippet: 2026 will likely be a busy year for crypto exchange-traded funds, which could help renew investor interest in digital asset markets.

title: How euro stablecoins could address EU’s dollar concerns
contentSnippet: The ECB is concerned that US dollar stablecoins could weaken its ability to affect policy, and European issuers have ideas about how this could be solved.

title: Crypto exchange Kraken submits confidential US IPO filing
contentSnippet: The confidential filing with the SEC for a US initial public offering came less than a week after Grayscale Investments announced a similar move.

title: Crypto Exchange Kraken Files for IPO Following $800 Million Raise
contentSnippet: Freshly valued at $20 billion, American cryptocurrency exchange Kraken said Wednesday that it has filed to go public.

title: Morning Minute: The White House and IRS Target Foreign Crypto Holdings
contentSnippet: Taxes are going to be more of a headache for those using offshore exchanges if this proposal passes. But does the move make sense?

title: Why Kohaku is central to Ethereum’s 2025 privacy shift
contentSnippet: Kohaku brings practical privacy to Ethereum wallets with safer recovery, private modes and shared standards designed for real-world use.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: This New Bitcoin, Crypto Wallet Scans Your Blood Vessels—And Needs Zero Passwords
contentSnippet: The G-Knot relies on finger vein-scanning technology. Its creators say it's safer, and easier to use, than established hardware wallets.

title: HSBC to bring tokenized deposits to US and UAE as stablecoin race heats up
contentSnippet: HSBC is the latest megabank to double down on tokenized deposits versus stablecoins by preparing for new launches in the US and the UAE next year.

title: Kenya’s new crypto law faces stress test as Bitcoin ATMs appear in malls
contentSnippet: Kenyan regulators say no crypto firms are licensed under the new VASP Act and warn that providers claiming approval are doing so illegally.

title: ストラテジーのセイラー会長、ウォール街参入による「ビットコイン弱体化」論を否定
contentSnippet: ストラテジーのセイラー会長がフォックス・ビジネスで、機関投資家の参入によりビットコインのボラティリティが大幅に低下していると発言した。2020年の約80%から現在50%まで縮小し、今後はS&P500の1.5倍程度に収束すると予測している。

title: アーク・インベスト、コインベースとサークル株を買い増し
contentSnippet: ARK投資のキャシー・ウッド氏、コインベースとサークル株を計720万ドル購入。ステーブルコイン市場の成長を見据え、仮想通貨関連株への投資を拡大。

title: ブラジル、仮想通貨のクロスボーダー決済に課税検討　規制強化で抜け穴封じ＝報道
contentSnippet: ブラジル政府が仮想通貨を利用したクロスボーダー決済への課税を検討している。中央銀行は2026年2月から新規制を施行し、ステーブルコインを含む国際送金を外為取引として扱う方針だが、税収漏れ対策として金融取引税（IOF）の対象とする案が浮上している。

title: サークルが「xリザーブ」発表、USDC担保型ステーブルコインを展開可能に
contentSnippet: サークルがブロックチェーン間でUSDC担保型ステーブルコインを展開可能にする相互運用インフラ「xリザーブ」を発表した。

title: 米SEC、2026年度検査で仮想通貨監視を重点項目から削除　規制緩和加速
contentSnippet: 米SECが2026年度の検査優先事項から仮想通貨監視を除外。トランプ政権下で規制姿勢が執行重視から対話重視に転換。コインベースやリップルとの訴訟解決など、業界への軟化姿勢が鮮明に。

title: イーサリアム財団、レイヤー2を単一チェーンのように操作できる「相互運用レイヤー」構想
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨イーサリアムの財団が複数のL2を単一チェーンのように操作できる相互運用レイヤー（EIL）の構想を解説。現在開発中のEILへの参加を呼びかけている。

title: コインベース上のモナドICO、開始23分で65億円弱調達も販売ペース鈍化
contentSnippet: コインベースで開始されたモナド（Monad）のトークンセールは、開始23分で64.5億円を調達したが、その後失速。高いFDV評価額やVC比率の高さが投資家の慎重姿勢を招いたとみられる。

title: 全米初のビットコイン担保地方債、米ニューハンプシャー州が承認
contentSnippet: ニューハンプシャー州が全米初のビットコイン担保地方債を承認した。1億ドル規模の債券でデジタル資産が140兆ドル規模の世界債券市場に参入する道を開く可能性が出た。

title: ハイパーリキッド・ストラテジーズ、ナスダック上場に向けた合併が延期に
contentSnippet: ソネット・バイオセラピューティクスらの合併によるハイパーリキッド財務企業の上場が延期された。株主投票の賛成票が必要数に達していない形だ。

title: アルトコイン現物ETFへの資金循環か　ビットコインとイーサリアムの商品から資金の純流出続く
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ビットコインとイーサリアムの現物ETFは、資金が純流出する日が継続している。この点について、ソラナやXRPなどのETFに資金が循環している可能性が指摘された。

title: Trump Congressional Ally Discloses Latest Six-Figure Bitcoin Purchase
contentSnippet: Brandon Gill has purchased up to $2.6 million in Bitcoin this year, according to House transaction reports.
